document_data.name: Agat amir-Doth
document_data.mainbody: '''Agat amir-Doth''' was a middle-aged [[elf]] and the Chief Vizier of [[Jumlat]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Agat relished intrigue and had a craving for [[human]] women.
document_data.Activities: Agat maintained a vast spy network, primarily among the poor citizens of Jumlat. One of Agat's favorite forms of entertainment was eliminating an attractive female target's family members one at a time until she had no other option but to join the ''harim''. Because of this veils were used more often in Jumlat in an attempt to mask beauty from Agat's predatory eyes.
